name: Crazy Ladder
description:
Make your way with your ladder through the intricate paths of a construction site, try to find the correct position, and move forward.

ControlsGamepad

Move with directional pad or left stick and rotate the ladder with R and L shoulders.

Keyboard & Mouse

Move with WASD and rotate the ladder with left and right mouse buttons.

Credits

  • Programming: Daniel Luque (GitHub: @LuqueDaniel, Twitter: @LuqueDaniel)
